aka: The Extraordinary Adventures of Mr. West in the Land of the Bolsheviks

cast.name: 鲍里斯·巴尔涅特 Boris Barnet
亚历山德拉·柯克洛娃 Aleksandra Khokhlova
弗谢沃罗德·普多夫金 Vsevolod Pudovkin
谢尔盖·科马罗夫 Sergei Komarov

writer.name: 弗谢沃罗德·普多夫金 Vsevolod Pudovkin

director.name: 列夫·库里肖夫 Lev Kuleshov

this_title: Необычайные приключения мистера Веста в стране большевиков
trans_title: 威斯特先生苏联历险记
The Extraordinary Adventures of Mr. West in the Land of the Bolsheviks
introduction: An example of ironic Soviet propagandistic film from the silent era, this film chronicles the adventures of an American, "Mr. West," and his faithful bodyguard and servant Jeddie, as they visit the land of the horrible, evil Bolsheviks. Through various mishaps, Mr. West discovers that the Soviets are actually quite remarkable people, and, by the end of the film, his opinion of them has changed to one of glowing admiration!
chinese_title: 威斯特先生苏联历险记
foreign_title: Необычайные приключения мистера Веста в стране большевиков
